DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis is that liquorice lowers plasma potassium. This study aims to elucidate the dose-response of this effect with two doses of liquorice (66 grams or 102 grams) per day for two weeks.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Liquorice on Plasma Potassium
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteers age 1840 any continuous medication hypertension or hypotension allergy to liquorice pregnancy or lactation difficult venipuncture drug or alcohol abuse participation in pharmaceutical trial
